# {{< bi image >}} Figure

::: {#fig-mc_basic}
![](composition/imgs/composition_pg/composition_pg.svg){width="1000px"}

Exemplary percentage conversion of the average atomic and mineralogic composition of lunar regolith reported by @Taylor1975. Oxygen is highlighted to underline its great abundance.
:::
